attributes.action: Stop interview process Round 1 for hiring junior doctors under MTAS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As DoH, royal colleges and BMA have admitted to gross unfairness of MTAS, there is no point in continuing with this process. Therefore we should immediately stop interviewing process. You can not have two different set of rules for Round 1 & 2.
